mapper.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(cart_payment_id),'1') FROM cart_payment WHERE cart_payment_id LIKE #{cdate} || '%'
SELECT sum(PD.product_cost*CPD.product_count) AS totalmoney FROM product PD JOIN cart_payment_detail CPD ON PD.product_id = CPD.product_id WHERE member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart_payment(cart_payment_id, member_id, payment_datetime, payment_method) VALUES (#{cart_payment_id},#{member_id},#{payment_datetime},#{payment_method})
